mapper.select: SELECT ec.id,ec.title,ec.price,et.name AS teacherName, es1.title AS subjectLevelOne,es2.title AS subjectLevelTwo,ec.lesson_num AS lessonNum,ec.cover FROM edu_course ec LEFT JOIN edu_teacher et ON ec.teacher_id = et.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject es1 ON ec.subject_parent_id = es1.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject es2 ON ec.subject_id = es2.id WHERE ec.id = #{id}
